file_content.text: I am not responsible for any oil or hydraulic fluids you may slip in while walking through this area.
I am AR-G0, class-three copilot droid. You may call me "Argo."
Take my advice. Give your droid regular maintenance every three thousand hours of use.
At the rate my servomotors are decaying, I'll be on the scrap-pile in a week.
Please do not touch that cargo container. It is especially fragile. I dropped it earlier.
You should compliment my mistress on her hair. She takes great care with it.
